name: Shell Internet Ventures B.V
overview: Shell Internet Ventures BV operates as an investment arm of Royal Dutch Shell plc. It focuses on development stage investment opportunities, particularly in the Internet, communications industries, and software. It also focuses on investments in the mobile applications sector. Shell Internet Ventures primarily invests is in companies based in the U.S. and Europe. It can also consider investments in Asia. The firm seeks to invest between $2 million and $10 million over two or more financing rounds. Shell Internet Ventures typically invests for a period of three years to five years. The firm was founded in 2000 and is based in The Hague, Netherlands. It has additional offices in Houston, Texas and London.
